title: Playground, Additional Storage, On-Site Management
neighborhood: 5999 Bear Creek Drive, Bedford Heights, OH
posting_body: Columbus Park Apartments provides an affordable selection of Spacious 1, 2, & 3 bedroom apartments tucked away in Bedford Heights, Ohio.
Life at Columbus Park Apartments is carefree and convenient.
Our landscaped grounds offer plenty of options for you, your family, and your pets to enjoy the fresh air.
We offer several convenient parking options such as detached garages and covered parking.
We are proud to be one of the few, and best, pet-friendly apartments in the Bedford Heights area.
Take your furry friends to our fenced-in Bark Park so they can run around and socialize with other residents.
Having a safe and secure playground for your pets is just one of the many convenient amenities we offer.
View our full list of apartment amenities and see why our residents love living here.
Our community location is set back in a cul-de-sac near Tinker’s Creek.

You can also look forward to the many enjoyable attractions that make living at Columbus Park the place to be such as Bedford City School District, close proximity to the Bedford Reservation and Jack Thistledown Racino, as well as several shops and dining in Historic Downtown Bedford.
5999 Bear Creek Drive, Bedford Heights, OH 44146
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
Specials are based on availability and may expire or change at any time.
Specials and discounts may not be combined.
Rates are subject to change without advance notice.
